name: Relic Keepers
description: Relic Keepers is an action game set in a fantasy setting. Helped by the village guards, keep the artefact inside the village walls and outlast a legion of evil creatures.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP or later Processor: Intel Pentium 4 (2001) and above or AMD Processors after 2003 Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: Any graphics card that supports Direct X 9 or above. DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 1 GB available space Sound Card: Direct X 9 sound device
